Articles.Content:
since a few versions the Flight Debug Stats disappear when the cheat-menu is closed.

I find that pretty annoying because I like to check the game's speed in some situations to know if my weak computer or my sluggish design is at fault and adjust my control input accordingly. of course the cheat window can be put on the lower screen corner, but this is a suboptimal workaround for me.

Please delete this thread, a replacement has been created!

thanks
